total_subquestions_ys: Q1: Identify the row that contains only 1s.
Q2: Remove all rows above and below the row identified in Q1.
Q3: Identify the column that contains only 1s.
Q4: Remove all columns to the left and right of the column identified in Q3.
Q5: The remaining grid is the output grid.
